ocrd-dummy.description: Bare-bones processor creates PAGE-XML and optionally copies file from input group to output group

copy_files.description: Whether to actually copy files (true) or just create PAGE-XML as a side effect (false)

ocrd-filter.description: Bare-bones processor can be dynamically configured to remove segments based on XPath queries

type.description: Which type of segments to remove from. Either a precise element name ('TextRegion', 'TextLine') or an alias ('all', 'region', 'line', 'word', 'glyph').

query.description:
Which segments to select for removal (XPath predicate). Matches unconditionally, if empty. For example, to remove elements with low text confidence, set 'pc:TextEquiv/@conf < 0.7'. Or low layout confidence, 'pc:Coords/@conf < 0.7'.
Supports extra predicates 'pc:area()' for the number of pixels of the bounding box, and 'pc:text()' for the first TextEquiv unicode string. For example, to remove high pixel-to-character rate, set 'pc:area(.) div string-length(pc:text(.)) > 500'.

plot.description: Whether to extract an image for each filtered segment and write to the output fileGrp.
